name: Sock Dating Sim
description:
This is a work in progress!

I have a Trello board for any typos or issues [HERE], if you find something not listed, please DM me on discord @Kirozanagi#2048 so I can update the board!

If you feel like supporting my work, feel free to buy me a ko-fi! [Here]

Or you can simply check out and reblog some of the art from my tumblr blog! [Here]
